headline: Alexandria Real Estate Equities (ARE) Valuation Check As Long Island City Lawsuits And Impairment Concerns Build
summary: Alexandria Real Estate Equities (ARE) is under pressure after multiple class action lawsuits and investigations questioned its disclosures around the Long Island City property, following October 2025 impairment charges and reduced guidance.
